snippet: Corporate deal developments and technology stocks were bright spots on Wall Street on a day when the indexes ended relatively flat.
abstract: Corporate deals and technology stocks are bright spots on Wall Street during quiet day when the main indexes end relatively flat.
lead_paragraph: Corporate deal developments and technology stocks were bright spots on Wall Street on a day when the indexes ended relatively flat.

headline.main: A Day for Markets to Tread Water
headline.print_headline: A Day for Markets to Tread Water
